title: Age of Fear 3 The Legend v5 3 1-PLAZA
description:
P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S

Age of Fear 3: The Legend v5.3.1 (c) Age of Fear
Release Date: 06/2018 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Indie

Age of Fear 3 is a turn-based strategy game that marries a tabletop
wargame with elements of RPG. You won't find pretty graphics here
but the game offers a deep and challenging gameplay, with a huge
variety of units, items, and skills, a hex-free battle system and a
groundbreaking AI, one of the most advanced in the genre

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/431700/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

NOTES: The new v5.3.1 update includes new graphics and also many
fixes. So we decided to make a new release

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX - STEAMPUNKS - CPY - SiMPLEX - ACTiVATED

Coming soon
